main event: A man in Newark, Ohio reported seeing a bright, rapidly moving object in the sky on September 6, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as round with a glowing red light,The object moved silently at a high rate of speed,The witness was unable to determine the size or distance due to poor lighting conditions,The local police were notified and subsequently reported the sighting to the Air Force,Physical trace evidence was found at the location and sent for analysis.
sighted object: a bright, round object with a glowing red light
